product: Alex Vando Mens Dress Shirts Regular Fit Long Sleeve Men Shirt
summary: Otherwise, nice shirt will purchase additional colors Seems like a pretty nice shirt for the price, but it’s a little bigger than expected. Not a biggie, I wasn't looking for a standard, flat darker blue shirt but one that was lighter with more sheen to it, like the pic. Very comfortable shirt, the pattern is bold but not over powering, just barely more expensive than a plain dress shirt, great value, great fit. Stylish shirt went well with my outfit very comfortable soft grey shirt I wore as a casual outfit.
question: Please summarize the reviews of Alex Vando Mens Dress Shirts Regular Fit Long Sleeve Men Shirt

product: Unlisted by Kenneth Cole Men's Dress Shirt Slim Fit Checks and Stripes
summary: Usually there would be another smaller cut such as extra slim, but this seems to be the smallest cut Producto de excelente calidad This shirt is not slim fit. Muy buena calidad el color es súper es lo que ofrecen en el anuncio Good quality and fits as expected. I would buy again Great value I love this shirt, fit as espected Shoulder section becomes tight due to perfect fit elsewhere The sleeves are very wide and short. Doesn't fit like a slim fit Excelente relación calidad y precio Initially, I was hesitant about the slim fit shirt.
question: Please summarize the reviews of Unlisted by Kenneth Cole Men's Dress Shirt Slim Fit Checks and Stripes

product: Kenneth Cole Unlisted Men's Dress Shirt Slim Fit Solid
summary: Por la experiencia de otros que la compraron decidí pedir una talla por encima de la que lleva mi esposo y quedo muy bien así  La recomiendo! I ordered one of these shirts and found that it fits and looks great so I ordered several other colors to add to my wardrobe. Usually there would be another smaller cut such as extra slim, but this seems to be the smallest cut Producto de excelente calidad This shirt is not slim fit. El ajuste de la camisa es bueno, pero la tela no cumple las expectativas de calidad según la mezcla de tejidos (algodón / poliéster).
question: Please summarize the reviews of Kenneth Cole Unlisted Men's Dress Shirt Slim Fit Solid

product: Van Heusen Men's Dress Shirt Regular Fit Poplin Solid
summary: I ordered one of these shirts and found that it fits and looks great so I ordered several other colors to add to my wardrobe. Nice shirt for the price Fits just right Really lovely shirt, nice fabric and colour was great This just isn’t a slim fit cut. Nice shirt and true fit good for casual dress SHirt cam with a 2 inch cut straight through the front and back of shirt. This shirt fit perfectly in all areas, neck, chest and waist were all very comfortable Very happy with the slim fit shirts from Kenneth Cole.
question: Please summarize the reviews of Van Heusen Men's Dress Shirt Regular Fit Poplin Solid

product: Amazon Essentials Men's Slim-Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Long-Sleeve Dress
summary: I ordered one of these shirts and found that it fits and looks great so I ordered several other colors to add to my wardrobe. Great shirt. Nice shirt for the price Fits just right Really lovely shirt, nice fabric and colour was great This just isn’t a slim fit cut. I have purchased Van Heusen shirts b4 and I knew the fit would be great   thank you The shirt fits just as I expect.
question: Please summarize the reviews of Amazon Essentials Men's Slim-Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Long-Sleeve Dress

product: Van Heusen Men's Dress Shirt Fitted Poplin Solid
summary: Great shirt. If you are Van Heusen lover like myself, you would know that even though this is a slim fit shirt it's still fits a little bit bigger. I ordered one of these shirts and found that it fits and looks great so I ordered several other colors to add to my wardrobe. Van Heusen fitted poplin button down shirts (wrinkle free) are the only kind of dress shirts that I have bought for the past several years.
question: Please summarize the reviews of Van Heusen Men's Dress Shirt Fitted Poplin Solid

product: Amazon Essentials Men's Standard Regular-fit Long-Sleeve Dress Shirt
summary: Great shirt. Las 3 camisas salieron como esperaba, pero fueron entregadas por el vendedor, como si fueran 3 camisas compradas por separado, a pesar de ser cobradas con la misma factura. Soooooooo scratchy Prefect thank u Easy care and looks good Love it Great shirt, the fabric is soft and carves very well, Amazon Essentials definitely my choice Fits fine. Great fit.
question: Please summarize the reviews of Amazon Essentials Men's Standard Regular-fit Long-Sleeve Dress Shirt

product: Allsense Men's Long Sleeve Regular Fit Dress Shirts
summary: Great shirt. Great fit. I ordered one of these shirts and found that it fits and looks great so I ordered several other colors to add to my wardrobe. I do think you have good merchandise .I don't believe the shirt was damaged in transit.
question: Please summarize the reviews of Allsense Men's Long Sleeve Regular Fit Dress Shirts

product: Van Heusen Men's Dress Shirt Regular Fit Oxford Solid
summary: I have owned really good Van Heusen shirts in the past but Rip Van Wrinkle must be the new owner of the company. The Van Heusen shirt comes with a large card on the front of the shirt that says 'WRINKLE FREE.' Great shirt. Great fit.
